title: Mapping the (un)healthy city: Proximity to urban facilities and chance of premature mortality from myocardial infarction in São Paulo city
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Cities, Volume 148

Author(s): Carlos Leite, Paulo Saldiva, Carmen Diva Saldiva de Andre, Ligia Vizeu Barrozo, Angelica Benatti Alvim, Tereza Herling, Eliene Corrêa, Claudia Acosta, Paulo Afonso de Andre, Luiz Fernando Ferraz da Silva, Ivan Pereira, Andresa Ledo Marques
